title: Ronaldo's Next Club Roulette
description:
The FC crew recap Germany's semifinal win over France thanks to Alexandra Popp's stellar brace. Plus, the panel try to figure out Barcelona's strongest front 3 heading into the season and take turns guessing where Cristiano Ronaldo will end up by the end of this summer's transfer window.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Alexandra Popp lifts Germany to Euro Final; Cristiano Ronaldo's continued indecision on future; Barcelona figuring out strongest front 3
